subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/Bubby-My Buddy-Cat_DENOISED.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : This is me trying to talk to my cat that passed away during the week (I miss him) and kinda feel bad trying to get his EVP....But he is MY FRIEND and I do miss the little guy :) I think I hear him at 2 seconds and at 9 seconds....anyone hear this "meow"?? At the area of 8 seconds there is what sounds like a roar....but is not a cat sound (don't know what ithat sound is).  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/Bubby-My%20Buddy-Cat_DENOISED.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
